Key Arguments: The legislation poses a threat to freedom of speech and democracy.
Australians have historically managed without government interference in free speech.
The government should not be the arbiter of truth.
The COVID-19 pandemic demonstrated government misinformation.
The bill lacks a right of appeal for censored online content.
Free and open debate is the best remedy to misinformation.
Notable Quotes: This is a real and genuine threat against the freedom of speech and democracy.
The Albanese government is not the arbiter of truth and they won’t be protecting people, they will be restricting people’s right to freedom of speech.
Governments arbitrating truth has never worked well in any nation at any time in history.
